name: shucks
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of modesty, embarrassment, disappointment, or anger: "You played great in the concert." "Shucks, everyone else was really good." Shucks, I missed the shot. See also
aw shucks

Linguistics: interjections

Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express slight regret or to show you are disappointed, or sometimes to show that something is not very important: Shucks, I wish I could have been there. Shucks, it wasn’t that hard to do.
